solution_line_template: Cand baked a total of {num_trays} x {cookies_per_tray} = <<{num_trays}*{cookies_per_tray}={total_cookies}>>{total_cookies} cookies.
Therefore, Candy placed {total_cookies}/{num_packs} = <<{total_cookies}/{num_packs}={cookies_per_pack}>>{cookies_per_pack} cookies in each pack.
